TextView.android:text: NEPTUNE- The Eight Planet from the Sun

Basic Information:
Type: Ice Giant
Order from Sun: 8th planet
Distance from Sun: ~4.5 billion km (~30.07 AU)
Diameter: 49,244 km
Mass: ~1.024 × 10²⁶ kg (about 17 times Earth's mass)
Gravity: 11.15 m/s² (about 114% of Earth's gravity)

Orbital And Rotational Characteristics:
Revolution period (around Sun): 164.8 Earth years
Rotation period (on its own axis): 16.11 Earth hours
Orbital Speed: 5.43 km/s
Axial Tilt: ~28.32°
Orbital Eccentricity: 0.0086

Moons And Rings:
Number of Moons: 14 (largest moon: Triton)
Number of Rings: 6

Surface And Atmosphere:
Surface Temperature: ~ -214°C (-353°F)
Atmosphere Type: Thick, mainly hydrogen, helium, and methane
Main Gases in Atmosphere: Hydrogen (H₂), Helium (He), Methane (CH₄)
Weather Conditions: Fastest winds in the Solar System (up to 2,100 km/h), massive storms, deep blue color due to methane
